explains: n. 激变，剧变；（地壳）隆起

sentences.en: He is resigned to the noise, the mess, the constant upheaval.
sentences.cn: 他对噪音、杂乱和持续动荡逆来顺受。

sentences.en: Whilst chaos and upheaval reigns in the college, what of the chaos and noise that local residents are subjected to ?
sentences.cn: 当混乱和动荡笼罩着学院的时候，当地的居民们又会遭受怎样的混乱和喧嚣呢？

sentences.en: I can't face the upheaval of moving house again.
sentences.cn: 我无法忍受再次搬家的折腾。
